statements: UPDATE social_media_data SET engagement_score = 50, sentiment_score = 75 WHERE post_id = '1e9e94a1-8a2b-4b7e-80e7-7b7796c44c51';
UPDATE social_media_data SET brand_mentions = 10, sentiment_score = 80 WHERE post_id = '26aacfea-016b-4920-b45d-852ceef009be';
UPDATE social_media_data SET engagement_score = 50, sentiment_score = 30 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_data SET brand_mentions = 10, engagement_score = 70, sentiment_score = 50 WHERE post_id = '98765432-12ab-1234-abcdef-1234567890ab';
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET likes_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerSentiments SET sentiment_score = 4.5, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE post_id = 2 AND customer_id = 101;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_content = 'New post content', likes_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerSentiments SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE post_id = 1 AND customer_id = 100;
UPDATE customer_engagement SET engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE brand_perception SET perception = 'Positive' WHERE perception_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_engagement SET engagement_score = 8.5, engagement_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE brand_perception SET perception = 'Positive feedback received', perception_date = '2022-09-20 15:45:00', customer_id = 201 WHERE perception_id = 501
UPDATE customer_data SET customer_name='John Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE brand_engagement SET engagement_level='High' WHERE brand_id=3;
UPDATE customer_data SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 4.2, sentiment_category = 'positive', analysis_timestamp = '2022-01-15 18:30:00' WHERE sentiment_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET location='New York' WHERE customer_id=123;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count=10, comments_count=5 WHERE post_id=456;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE posts SET post_text='Updated post text', likes_count=15, comments_count=10 WHERE post_id=5;
